dsOverview.title: Southern Hemisphere Climatology, climatology and monthly, by Jenne

summary.p: A selected climatology of the Southern Hemisphere using the Navy Marine Atlas Series and monthly mean rawinsonde data from "climat temp" reports as published in NCC's "Monthly Climatic Data for the World".
The data is free and has been combined with the Northern Hemisphere data in ds205.0.
